Original:
先點一杯Gin Tonic試試看調酒師功力，好喝耶！
1樓與B1各自獨立都有廁所🚾，位置比想像的多很多，B1有包廂可以唱歌🎤，低消好像1萬2000元，可以容納15-20人，4小時，希望生意興隆。
消費目前是付現或轉帳，之後可以刷卡。
EN:
First order a cup of GIN TONIC and try to see the skill of the bartender, delicious!
The first floor and B1 have toilets independently. There are much more positions than expected. B1 has a box to sing. It seems to be 12,000 yuan in low consumption. It can accommodate 15-20 people and 4 hours. I hope the business is booming.
Consumption is currently paid or transferred, and you can swipe your card afterwards.
